name: Human in Service
description:
Description

As the appointed human in service to the Global Environment Service (GES), you must ready at any time to help fix any malfunctions.

Team members

Natasha Bianca Mangan 

Main Game Music was produced and created by Natasha Bianca Mangan 

Assets used
  • Spaceship Interior Environment Set by Denys Rutkovskyi (Chair Mesh)
  • UIWS - Unified Interactive Water System by egray.io
  • Female Mannequin Character for Stylized Female by PO-Art
  • Stylized - Dynamic Nature by Studio Kobo
  • Metatron_Omega_-_Illuminatio_-_01_Ecclesia_Universalis (edited)
  • Storage House Set by Alexander Sychov
Controls

WASD - Walking around /Movement

Shift - Sprint 

Left Mouse Button - Interact

Mouse - Look Around / Camera Movement
